title: How do I update my TalkBand B2 and the Huawei Wear application?
answer:
Before updating, make sure the B2 is connected to your phone.

  • Updating the TalkBand B2: In the Huawei Wear application, go to settings (upper left corner) and touch "Update TalkBand B2". B2 will check for the latest software version and perform any available updates.


  • Updating the Huawei Wear App: In the Huawei Wear application, go to settings (upper right corner) and touch "About". Then check for App Updates.
